page.title: 12RELIGION, CHURCHES
page.content:
{RELIGION CHURCHES
In our square there are three churches.{St. Christophers church}is situated in tne hamlet of{Ditteridge A priest in charge conducts regular morning services every Sunday.The church itself was built in the 13th Century. Right alongside of the main road in the village is the{Methodist {Church.}It has no resident preacher but a visiting preacher conducts the services with the aid of a local lay reader. {Box Parish Church}is off the main{A.4.}near the recreation field. Iis quiet location is ideal.This church was built in the 19th Century.
